basics.name: Danny Ceccattini
basics.label: Software Developer
basics.summary:
Full-Stack developer.
Lover of all things engineering and plain old problem-solving.
Technical precision, critical thinking, novelty, curiosity and teamwork is what I look for and admire.

education.awards: Graduated with GPA of 4/4 | With Honours | Awarded the Vice Chancellor's Award of Academic Excellence.

awards.title: Vice Chancellor's Commendation for Academic Excellence
awards.summary: High-Distinction Average | GPA of 4.0/4.0 | With Honours

awards.title: The Adam Weishaupt Award for 'Being A Deep One'
awards.summary: For contributions to the critical discussion on the future of AI and ethical implications.

work.summary: Currently part of a small team of 3D-modelling and CAD specialists, structural engineers and architects building a decision analysis and generative design application to be utilised by financial, engineering and construction professionals.
Designed and built a variety of projects inspired by wikipedia, parksNSW, Cards Against Humanity and various flight search-engines.

highlights: Responsible for pricing and general coordination of industrial constructions and structural engineering projects.
Scheduled works to ensure safe and smooth work-flow for all on-site contractors and meetings with industry professionals.
General correspondence with clients, contractors, respective authorities and preparing verbal and written reports to office administrators.
work.summary: DEME Industrial specializes in industrial construction and structural engineering consultancy and fabrication

highlights: Oversaw production of preformed structural columns for residential and commercial high-rises.
Developed a series of Excel databases quantifying volume materials, overall production costs as well as a series of calculations with the aim of reducing costs and improving efficiency.
work.summary: HL-Luxicon was a joint venture between Luxicon Industrial and Hi-Lite Engineering born out of the necessity to provide in-house structural and mechanical engineering solutions to bathroom/kitchen pod manufacturing and installations.

highlights: Responsible for the formulation and execution of test scripts and test plans of the Calvin Klein and Tommy Hilfiger websites for 28 EU and non-EU states.

Worked within a team of supply chain, customer service and operation specialists, as well as software developers and UX designers to ensure a complete integration between the various platforms necessary for the online sales of Calvin Klein and Tommy Hilfiger. Such platforms involve numerous postal carriers, financial service institutions, payment services and SAP supply chain operations and customer relations.
work.summary: PVH is a fashion and lifestyle company, operating three main business groups â€“ Calvin Klein, Tommy Hilfiger and Heritage.

highlights: Responsible for scheduling and coordinating civil and structural works, contractors, as well as technical correspondence with engineers, architects and various local and federal government authorities.
Responsible for general correspondence with on-site contractors, office clientele and authorities.
work.summary: Worked as a sole trader for a number of key clients with the responsibility to oversee and coordinate small industrial construction projects.
